item.title: Windows WSL ubuntu adb 配置
item.description: 配置前的状态 windows 11 + wsl + ubuntu 18.04 windows 可以识别 adb devices C:\Users>adb devices List of devices attached fada-018b4209f24d0001 device wsl 识别不到 adb devices luyang@LUYANG:~$ adb devices * daemon not running; starting now at tcp:5037 * daemon started successfully List of devices attached Windows 安装工具包 windows 安装 usbipd-win WSL 安装工具包
